ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors extend their appreciation to the Deanship of Scientific Research at King Saud University for funding this work through research group No (RG-1440-016). Furthermore, the authors would like to sincerely thank the National Research Centre and Department of Botany, Faculty of Science, Mansoura University, Egypt. Mohamed Hegazy gratefully acknowledges the financial support from the Alexander von Humboldt Foundation “Georg Foster Research Fellowship for Experienced Researchers”.
